alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 8:27PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nez Perce and southwestern Lewis Counties through 815 PM PDT... At 726 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Winchester, or 24 miles southeast of Lapwai, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Craigmont, Nezperce and Mohler. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 269 and 276. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
